root: ^I never expected that renovating grandpa’s old house would lead to seeing things from a new perspective.
^I have to thank you grandpa, you left me one last life lesson through this house.
^You made me realize that I can’t keep running away like I have.
^It’s time to actually do something about it all, to find the next step in my journey to heal.
^Maybe Rebecca can help me find that next step, just like grandma and grandpa always did for each other.
